gold.user: As a developer, I want to retrieve a list of all collections in the Directus API so that I can understand the available data structures.
gold.ideal: The response should include an array of collection objects, each containing details such as id, name, and schema.

gold.user: As an admin, I want to create a new collection in the Directus API so that I can store custom data relevant to my application.
gold.ideal: The response should return the newly created collection object with its id and other relevant details.

gold.ideal: The response should include the collection object with its properties such as id, name, and fields.
